The biggest change by far for Nokia is its tacit admission that its Symbian operating platform has failed to become competitive, illustrated by its bold move to take on Microsoft's mobile platform for its smartphones. I think there was a recognition that for something to effectively compete and ultimately win against Android and iPhone, it would require some big muscle, Stephen Elop said at a joint news conference with Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . Representative Mike Pence of Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012." The decision of Mr. Mike Pence , which was first reported by The Indianapolis Star,

I am happy to see the performance profiling capabilities, since that's an area every phone developer must face when building applications, said Lhotka, whose team's first Windows Phone 7 application hit the Marketplace yesterday. Steve Ballmer said that with about 1,000 apps at launch, Microsoft is ahead of its competitors in their marketplace launch phases.

Great gift ideas for guys on V-Day Find out his hobbies. If the guy is into wine you'll want to get a fabulous decanter. If the guy's into cigars maybe a humidor. Find out what he collects, what he's interested in. It can be as simple as golf balls with his name on it. You can come up with really cool concepts.
